sentences.sContent: I am writing to confirm /enquire/inform you…
sentences.sContent_eng: I am writing to confirm /enquire/inform you…
sentences.sCn: 我写信是要确认/询问/通知你…

sentences.sContent: I recently e-mailed one website to enquire why my goods had not yet arrived.
sentences.sContent_eng: I recently e-mailed one website to enquire why my goods had not yet arrived.
sentences.sCn: 我最近给一个网站发邮件去询问为什么我订购的商品还没有到达。

sentences.sContent: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter, enquire who in it is worthy; and there abide till ye go thence.
sentences.sContent_eng: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter, enquire who in it is worthy; and there abide till ye go thence.
sentences.sCn: 你们无论进那一城，那一村，要打听那里谁是好人，就住在他家，直住到走的时候。

remMethod.val: en(向内) + quir(追问) + e → 追问到里面 → 询问； 查问
